types.name: codecatalyst_createDevEnvironmentRepoType
types.description: Type of Git repository provided to the Amazon CodeCatalyst dev environment create wizard

types.name: codecatalyst_updateDevEnvironmentLocationType
types.description: Locality of the Amazon CodeCatalyst update dev environment request (i.e., from the thin client or the local IDE instance)

types.name: findingId
types.description: The id of a security finding from a code scan

types.name: detectorId
types.description: The id of the detector which produced the code scan issue

metrics.name: aws_openLocalTerminal
metrics.description: Open local terminal with aws connection injected

metrics.name: codecatalyst_createDevEnvironment
metrics.description: Create an Amazon CodeCatalyst Dev Environment

metrics.name: codecatalyst_updateDevEnvironmentSettings
metrics.description: Update properties of a Amazon CodeCatalyst Dev Environment

metrics.name: codecatalyst_updateDevfile
metrics.description: Trigger a devfile update on a Amazon CodeCatalyst dev environment

metrics.name: codecatalyst_localClone
metrics.description: Clone a Amazon CodeCatalyst code repository locally

metrics.name: codecatalyst_connect
metrics.description: Connect to a Amazon CodeCatalyst dev environment

metrics.name: codecatalyst_devEnvironmentWorkflowStatistic
metrics.description: Workflow statistic for connecting to a dev environment

metrics.name: codewhisperer_codeScanIssueHover
metrics.description: Called when a code scan issue is hovered over

metrics.name: codewhisperer_codeScanIssueApplyFix
metrics.description: Called when a code scan issue suggested fix is applied
